Sentencas: Barium indate (Ba2In2O5) is known to be a good proton conducting oxide at moderate temperatures.
Titulo: Phase stabilisation, chemical behaviour and protonic conductivity of vanadium doped Barium Indate for ITSOFC application

Sentencas: Vanadium substituted barium indate, Ba(2)In(2-x)V(x)O(5+x)solid solutions were synthesized by ceramic route and their hydrated samples were prepared to evaluate their stability in presence of moisture.
Titulo: Phase stabilisation, chemical behaviour and protonic conductivity of vanadium doped Barium Indate for ITSOFC application

Sentencas: Partial substitution for In3+ by V5+ led to the stabilization of the Ba2In2O5 cubic form at lower temperatures.
Titulo: Phase stabilisation, chemical behaviour and protonic conductivity of vanadium doped Barium Indate for ITSOFC application

Sentencas: Their thermal as well chemical stability was studied using thermogravimetry and x-ray diffraction techniques.
Titulo: Phase stabilisation, chemical behaviour and protonic conductivity of vanadium doped Barium Indate for ITSOFC application

Sentencas: At high temperature, in presence of moisture indium leached out as In(OH)(3), whereas in presence of CO2 barium comes out as BaCO3 from Ba2In2O5.
Titulo: Phase stabilisation, chemical behaviour and protonic conductivity of vanadium doped Barium Indate for ITSOFC application

Sentencas: The effect of vanadium substitution in Ba(2)In(2)O(5)on its chemical stability was demonstrated.
Titulo: Phase stabilisation, chemical behaviour and protonic conductivity of vanadium doped Barium Indate for ITSOFC application

Sentencas: As vanadium content increases the hydrated composition of the above oxides exhibit enhanced stability.
Titulo: Phase stabilisation, chemical behaviour and protonic conductivity of vanadium doped Barium Indate for ITSOFC application
